text: "The requested URL /pub/apache/tomcat/tomcat-9/v9.0.0.M26/bin/apache-tomcat-9.0.0.M26.exe was not found on this server." is returned when trying to download "32-bit/64-bit Windows Service Installer".
creator: apachetomcat.to.davies@spamgourmet.com
markt@apache.org
text: Probably a broken mirror. That happens from time to time. Please choose a different mirror. All the ones I tested worked.
